summary: A girl who moves to the city after her fiancé lacks the courage to face his father ,who is against their relationship. In the city the girls winds up being abused by men, giving birth to a child and supporting herself on prostitution.
cast: Marie-Louise Fock|Ture Ara|Kunto Karapää|Lauri Korpela|Annie Sundman|Ida Salmi|Sven Relander|Paavo Jännes|Frans Kampman|Kosti Aaltonen|Kaarlo Aavajoki|Fritz-Hugo Backman|Sven Ehrström|Eino Haavisto|Vili Järe|Atos Konst|Onni Korhonen|Otto Noro|Lida Salin|Helinä Svensson|Oscar Tengström|Aili Tikka
keywords: stabbed to death|stabbed with a knife|jealous rage|jealousy|crucifix
title: Sellaisena kuin sinä minut halusit
